title: Change Language To Korean
body:
안녕! 영어 잘 못해요.
Sorry if my English is bad, I will try to make it legible. I am from Korea.
I move to USA in July and I bought a new PC. I cannot use Korean in League of Legends and I need help to change it.

Thank you for reading.
_- aphlx_

replies.body: The NA region doesn't currently support Korean as one of the [**available languages to choose from**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594).

Okay! Thank you.
Any way other than the available languages to choose to get Korean?

Hey dude, there is actually one method to change the language... but it is really annoying. Basically you have to install both versions of the game and then take with a software like Wooxy the file containing all the text in korean and moving it into the english version. You then have to take the fonts files from the korean version and move them as well. 

I do not reccomend this.. it is way too tricky and has to be updated every patch

I don't understand too well. You have video or something that can help me?
Thank you for helping!
Will there be a fix for this? I really enjoyed playing on korean..
Well u can change ur language to korean: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6dy3n6/since_alot_of_people_are_trying_to_change_there/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kuKAWo40jik ... This method works for a lot of languages but sadly not for korean... :( im sorry

Okay! Very thank you.
Is there any way you know other than this one to get Korean?
Sadly out of the entire list shown in the video, korean is the only language that does not work :( Sorry

Thank you. Until I try to learn the English Korean translate.
Right now having trouble with Runes, try to figure out how to translate them.
That is most of my troubling. Thank you for all the helping!
Hey man just a heads up, runes are getting completely changed very soon so if you want to buy runes, I'd wait till they get reworked. Buying runes right now would be wasting IP :)
